channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- GPAC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unspecified -- GPAC

item.title: CVE-2022-3957|2024-08-03T01:27:53.060Z -- unspecified -- gpac
item.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic was found in GPAC. Affected by this vulnerability is the function svg_parse_preserveaspectratio of the file scenegraph/svg_attributes.c of the component SVG Parser. The manipulation leads to memory leak. The attack can be launched remotely. The name of the patch is 2191e66aa7df750e8ef01781b1930bea87b713bb. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-213463.
